keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

headline.main: 1965: Marines With Unloaded Guns: Viet Cong? Sing ‘Em a Song?

snippet: From the archives of the International Herald Tribune: American Marines in Vietnam complain about orders that prevent them from keeping bullets in the chambers of their weapons.
abstract: From the archives of the International Herald Tribune: American Marines in Vietnam complain about orders that prevent them from keeping bullets in the chambers of their weapons.
